awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: "Sugar" Ray is the owner of an illegal casino, who contend with the pressures of vicious gangster and corrupt policemen who want to see him go out of business. In the world of organized crime and police corruption in the 1920s, any dastardly trick is fair!

title: Harlem Nights
